otherErrors.minNameError: Name must be more than 2 letters

pageNotFound.subtext: Sorry, the page you're looking for cannot be accessed

homePage.aboutTitle: Our Project Management application is the success of your team's work.
homePage.subtext: Our team brings you the development tool used by agile teams

about.description: A kanban board is an agile project management tool designed to help visualize work, limit work-in-progress, and maximize efficiency (or flow). It can help both agile and DevOps teams establish order in their daily work. Kanban boards use cards, columns, and continuous improvement to help technology and service teams commit to the right amount of work, and get it done!
about.heroText: By dividing the project into small tasks, you simplify the work process and the ability to divide the project between employees of different levels, capabilities and qualifications.

benefits.title: Our benefits
benefits.aboutText: By managing your project with our application, you get:

aboutItems.2: Unlimited number of tasks in the project
aboutItems.5: Ability to add and remove tasks at any time
aboutItems.6: Ability to save and load projects

rsSchool.title: Online course 'Development with Angular'
rsSchool.subtext: This project was made as part of the Angular course from the community

mainText.title: Who is this course for
mainText.subtext: The course is intended for RS School 2021Q3 students who have passed RS School stage #2, as well as for new students who have knowledge and practical experience in using the following technologies and tools

free.title: Free education
free.subtext: The principle of 'Pay it forward' works at RS School. We share our knowledge with students for free now, hoping that in the future they will return to us as mentors and pass on their knowledge to the next generation of students in the same way.

peaple.title: For evryone
peaple.subtext: Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment and place of residence.

sertificate.title: training term: 2 months
sertificate.subtext: A recording of the webinar will be posted on the school's YouTube channel.

period.title: Certificate
period.subtext: A certificate is issued to all those who successfully complete the course.

homePage.title: Our team

memberDescription.s: Sergey is a fourteen-year-old guy who made a login, registration, boards page, very cool additional functionality, and also finalized and deployed the backend. I am also an active member of the team.
memberDescription.v: Victor is the beginner Angular developer on the team. Participated in the creation of homepage, edit user profile and search task component. Participated in the discussion of the project.
memberDescription.e: Hi! I am a team leader. Now I'll tell you a little about what I'm doing here. Initially, I worked with Header and Footer, then I created a page with a board, and also set up NgRx and created a user session. Helped a little with the welcome page.
